sn25.9:1: At Sāvatthī. "Bhikkhus, the earth element is impermanent, changing, becoming otherwise. The water element … The heat element … The air element … The space element … The consciousness element is impermanent, changing, becoming otherwise.[n.27]Viññāṇadhātuis missing inEe,but found in Be and Se.One who … with enlightenment as his destination."
